label: MINSTREL SHOW TO BE HELD THURSDAY NIGHT

resource.chars:
MINSTREL SHOW TO BE
HELD THURSDAY NIGHT

Progress Club, of College Park,
will hold a minstrel show in the
Auditorium Thursday evening, the
proceeds to be used for the Prince
George’s County Student Scholar-
ship to the University, and for the
general Improvement of the com-
munity.
Since College Park Is also the
students’ community and since the
proceeds are to be used for such
worthy causes, it is hoped the stu-
dents will support the affair.
The talent will come from Wash-
ington and a splendid minstrel show
is promised.
